Text: Ugh - not only do you fail to provide thumbnails, but you name your directories with all sorts of characters that cause issues for people using the command-line - especially Linux users.  One has to appreciate the effort involved in donating uploads, but jeez - a tiny bit more effort and I'm sure you'd have more seeders.
thank you so much for comment will change it ASAP.
It gets worse - been stuck at 15% for 3 hours.  Very sad.
